title: Kupperman on Native American Exchanges - Change

content.prompt: Which of the following factors most extensively changed the relationship described in the excerpt by the 1760s?

choices.label: The efforts of the British government to gather tax revenue from the colonies

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
